sections.title: This Is a Founder-Led Practice
sections.subhead: Cupcakes + Broccoli is led by Amanda Johnson.
body: It is not a generic platform or a faceless subscription product. It is a founder-led practice built around experience, judgment, and care. Membership, consulting, learning, and Blind Dinners all flow from that center.
People do not come here for hype.
They come for clarity.

sections.title: A Career Inside Complex Systems
body: Amanda Johnson has spent her career inside complex systems where decisions matter.

She has led strategy and marketing work inside major organizations and advised senior leaders on initiatives tied to revenue, reputation, and growth. She understands how power moves and how decisions actually get made.
She has also worked closely with Black-owned small businesses navigating limited access and unclear rules. She understands what it means to build without a safety net.
Cupcakes + Broccoli lives at the intersection of those two realities.

sections.title: Structure Where There Is Chaos
body: People who work with Amanda describe a consistent pattern.
She listens closely.
She does the work.
She stays through execution.
She brings structure where there is chaos and momentum where things feel stuck. This approach shapes everything at Cupcakes + Broccoli.

inlineLink.label: See how this shows up in practice

sections.title: Ownership Is the Strategy
body: Cupcakes + Broccoli was created after a series of professional and personal inflection points.

After years inside corporate environments, Amanda experienced workplace harm, public undermining, and termination. She challenged that experience through formal channels and lost. What followed was uncertainty and the realization that institutional stability is often fragile, especially for Black women.
At the same time, personal loss reshaped how she thought about time, work, and ownership.
Cupcakes + Broccoli exists because relying on systems that were not built for us is not a strategy.
Ownership is.

sections.title: A Membership-Based Ecosystem
body: Cupcakes + Broccoli is a membership-based ecosystem centered on guidance, learning, and community.
It includes:
list: An AI concierge built around real founder questions
bodyAfter: This is not about hustle or constant growth. It is about building something sustainable, on purpose.

sections.title: A Core Expression of the Work
body: Blind Dinners are a core expression of this work.
They are small, invitation-based gatherings hosted by Amanda for Black founders. They are not networking events or panels. They are moments of trust and shared perspective.
Blind Dinners are intentionally limited and available to select members.

image.alt: Portrait layered over a patterned textile background.

sections.title: Joy and Discipline
body: Cupcakes + Broccoli is about balance.
Joy and discipline.
Creativity and rigor.
Vision and execution.
You cannot live on cupcakes alone.
You also cannot thrive on broccoli alone.
This platform exists to help founders hold both.

sections.title: You Are Welcome Here
body: Cupcakes + Broccoli is for Black founders who want to think clearly, build deliberately, and own what they create.
If you are looking for quick wins or surface-level motivation, this may not be the right place.
If you are looking for clarity, honesty, and a community grounded in real experience, you are welcome here.
